alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Clearfield; Elk; McKean; Potter; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 13 at 6:21AM EDT until September 13 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Warren, McKean, Potter, Elk, Cameron and Clearfield Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clearing skies. light wind and cooling of the moist air near the ground has resulted in widespread dense fog across the Northwest Mountains of Pennsylvania early today. The dense fog will last through the morning commute to work and school.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. For dense fog safety information, visit weather.gov/fog. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
